name: Pyra (Weaf99)
description:
Pyra is a prototype for a mystery adventure game set in the dessert where the player is challenged to traverse rough terrain. By using magical powers the player is able to control the earth elements and create platforms to reach their goals and help uncover the truth of the lands. 

Controls:

 Move left/right = "A" and "D"

Jump = "W" or "SPACE" 

Place Platform = "left mouse button"

Hotkeys: 

"R" = Restart         "ESC" = Exit Game
